Package ca.team4308.absolutelib.subsystems.simulation

Class SimulationBase

java.lang.Object
edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command.SubsystemBase
ca.team4308.absolutelib.wrapper.AbsoluteSubsystem
ca.team4308.absolutelib.subsystems.simulation.SimulationBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Sendable, Subsystem
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArmSimulation, ElevatorSimulation, PivotSimulation
public abstract class SimulationBase extends AbsoluteSubsystem
Base class for subsystem simulations with automatic logging. All outputs are logged under the subsystem's path: /subsystems/(name)/simulation/...
